Finance charge of 1.5% (18% APR) assessed on all past-due invoices.
NO RETURNS AFTER 30 DAYS.
Return Goods Authorization (RGA) number is required on all returns. All returns subject to a minimum of a 25% restocking charge. No returns on electrical parts. Returns must be accompanied with a copy of Original Invoice or Packing Slip. No claims for shortag allowed after 7 days. All returns must show RGA number on box or they will be refused. No returns on special order parts.
To make a secure payment, view your billing activity and to manage your payment methods please log into your account at
https://secure.versapay.com
. If you need help accessing your account or want to make a payment with our customer service team, please contact us at (763) 479-2501, option 5 or by email at AR@herculift.com.

body.table:
Item Desc Qty
EA Net
<#assign total_material = 0> <#assign total_order = 0> <#assign internalamt = 0 /> <#assign internaltaxamt = 0 /> <#assign show_service_labor_qty = record.entity.custentity_sna_hul_show_servce_labor_pdf>
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.item =="Planned Maintenance"> <#assign has_planned_maintenance = true> <#break> <#else> <#assign has_planned_maintenance = false>
</#if> </#list>
<#assign service_items = ['*Service Labor - Resource', '*Travel Time', 'Bereavement', 'Jury Duty', 'Labor Double Time', 'Labor Overtime', 'Lunch', 'Paid Time Off', 'S', 'SDT', 'Sick Leave', 'SOT', 'Travel Double Time', 'Travel Overtime', 'Unpaid Time Off', 'Vacation Leave']> <#assign service_item_net = 0> <#assign service_item_total_qty = 0>
<#if has_planned_maintenance> <#list record.item as item> <#if !item.custcol_sna_do_not_print && !item.custcol_sna_default_rev_stream>
<#if item.itemtype=="InvtPart"> <#assign total_material = total_material + item.amount > <#else> <#assign total_order = total_order + item.amount > </#if>
<#if item.itemtype=="Service">
<#if item.item=="Planned Maintenance"> <#assign flat_rate = item.cseg_sna_revenue_st.custrecord_sna_hul_flatrate> <#assign body_flat_rate = record.cseg_sna_revenue_st.custrecord_sna_hul_flatrate> ${item.item}
Planned Maintenance : ${item.cseg_sna_revenue_st?keep_after_last(":")} <#if body_flat_rate> 1 <#else> ${item.quantity} </#if> ${item.rate?string("$#,##0.00")} ${item.amount}
<#else>
<#list service_items as service_item> <#if item.item == service_item> <#assign included_service = true> <#assign service_item_net = service_item_net + item.amount > <#assign service_item_total_qty = service_item_total_qty + item.quantity> <#break> <#else> <#assign included_service = false> </#if> </#list> </#if>
<#else> ${item.item} ${item.description} ${item.quantity} ${item.rate?string("$#,##0.00")} ${item.amount} </#if>
<#else> <#assign internalamt = internalamt + item.amount /> <#assign internaltaxamt = internaltaxamt + item.custcol_ava_taxamount /> </#if> </#list>
<#if included_service && record.entity.custentity_sna_hul_show_servce_labor_pdf>
Service Labor
<#if flat_rate>
<#else> ${service_item_total_qty} </#if>
${service_item_net?string.currency}
</#if>
<#else> <#list record.item as item> <#if !item.custcol_sna_do_not_print && !item.custcol_sna_default_rev_stream>
<#if item.itemtype=="InvtPart"> <#assign total_material = total_material + item.amount > <#else> <#assign total_order = total_order + item.amount > </#if>
<#if item.itemtype == "Service">
<#list service_items as service_item> <#if item.item == service_item> <#assign included_service = true> <#assign service_item_net = service_item_net + item.amount > <#assign service_item_total_qty = service_item_total_qty + item.quantity> <#break> <#else> <#assign included_service = false> </#if> </#list>
<#if included_service == false> ${item.item} ${item.description}
${item.rate?string("$#,##0.00")} ${item.amount} </#if>
<#else> ${item.item} ${item.description} ${item.quantity} ${item.rate?string("$#,##0.00")} ${item.amount} </#if>
<#else> <#assign internalamt = internalamt + item.amount /> <#assign internaltaxamt = internaltaxamt + item.custcol_ava_taxamount /> </#if> </#list>
<#if service_item_net != 0>
Service Labor
<#if record.entity.custentity_sna_hul_show_servce_labor_pdf> ${service_item_total_qty} <#else>
</#if>
${service_item_net?string.currency}
</#if>
</#if>

th.style: font-weight: bold; border-bottom: solid #000000;border-top: solid #000000; width: 20%;

font-weight: bold; border-bottom: solid #000000;border-top: solid #000000; width: 55%

body.table:
<#if record.custpage_tasklist?has_content>
        <#assign tasklist = record.custpage_tasklist?eval>
        <#list tasklist as task>
            

                ${task.task_num}
                ${task.date}
                ${task.hr_meter_reading}
                ${task.action_taken}
            
        </#list>
    </#if>
